GeneDef.label: summon anima tree
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon an anima tree at a location once per quadrum. The tree will be able to grow even if placed on stone flooring.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. You should still be able to interact with them like you could any other anima tree.

GeneDef.label: summon polux tree
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a polux tree at a location once per year. The tree will be able to grow even if placed on stone flooring.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. It should still act as any other polux tree would though.

GeneDef.label: summon enhanced corn
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a super enhanced corn plant at a location once per quadrum. The plant will be able to grow even if placed on stone flooring.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. The issue shouldn't cause any gameplay issues, it will just look strange.

The issue shouldn't cause any gameplay issues, it will just look strange.

The issue shouldn't cause any gameplay issues, it will just look strange.

GeneDef.label: summon glow pod
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a glow pod at a location once per quadrum. This glow pod will survive as long as it doesn't take any damage.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. The issue shouldn't cause any gameplay issues, it will just look strange.

GeneDef.label: summon gauranlen pod
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a gauranlen pod at a location once per quadrum.\n\nDespite my best efforts, I could not get the ability to disable spots that already have plants. The issue shouldn't cause any gameplay issues, it will just look strange.

GeneDef.label: summon wood pillar
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of wood at a location once per quadrum. This pillar is so dense it will require a miner come carefully take it apart bit by bit.\n\nThis provides a method of getting wood that doesn't involve chopping down trees or growing crops.

GeneDef.label: summon stone
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillars of various stones at specified locations once per quadrum. These pillars are guaranteed to give 9 chunks.

GeneDef.label: summon steel
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of steel at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a lot of the resource.

GeneDef.label: summon silver
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of silver at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a lot of the resource.

GeneDef.label: summon gold
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of gold at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a lot of the resource.

GeneDef.label: summon uranium
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of uranium at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a lot of the resource.

GeneDef.label: summon plasteel
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of plasteel at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a lot of the resource.

GeneDef.label: summon jade
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of jade at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a lot of the resource.

GeneDef.label: summon components
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of useless stone with some components in it at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a bunch of components.

GeneDef.label: summon advanced components
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summon a pillar of useless stone with some advanced components in it at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a several advanced components.
